text: I remember playing the demo for this on the playstation magazine demo disc and being blown away. I thought that games are getting so awesome just being able to walk around and jump and move the camera the world of video games seemed different. I felt that it showed that the ps2 was an amazing machine. To top it off the game was amazing and different. I hate escort type missions which is what most of this game is but they did it so well it didn't bother me as much.

author: bushwhacker2k

text:
It always baffles me when people accuse a universally acclaimed game of sucking. I mean movies I can understand that everyone has diffrent tastes, but except in some very isolated instances most people can agree if a game is good or not since it either has broken gameplay or it does not. I respect someone who said Ico is overrated, but to say it flat-out sucks despite refined gameplay is just stupid. 
Anyways, I always get shivers when I hear this song.
